publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3214 Mr Jamie Stone: Job Losses at O2 Call Centre, Thurso—That the Parliament expresses deep concern over the job losses that have occurred at the O2 call centre in Thurso; notes the detrimental economic impact that this will have on the local area; recognises the difficulty of suitable job relocation for the workforce in the immediate area, and urges action from the Scottish Executive, Her Majesty’s Government and Highlands and Islands Enterprise to assist Manpower in finding other contracts which would fully utilise the distinctive skill base of the workforce and, if necessary, find the recruitment opportunities and/or training services to help the workforce find alternative employment.
